post.title: New Blog Launches
post.fullText: Today, the Connor Kurtz Music Reviews blog has gone live. The first two reviews, of the two latest albums from Michael Pisaro, are available now.{~br /~}{~br /~}Chheck out the new blog here: {~a target="_blank" href="http://connorkurtzmusic.blogspot.ca/"~}http://connorkurtzmusic.blogspot.ca/{~/a~}
post.shortText: Today, the Connor Kurtz Music Reviews blog has gone live.

post.title: New Project: Good Old Neon
post.fullText: A new project has began between brothers Connor and Owen Kurtz. The first album, {~i~}Musik kann marschieren{~/i~}, is available now on Bachelors of Science Records.{~br /~}{~br /~}Download it for free, here: {~a target="_blank" href="https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/musik-kann-marschieren-2"~}https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/musik-kann-marschieren-2{~/a~}
post.shortText: A new project has began between brothers Connor and Owen Kurtz. The first album is available now.

post.title: Website Launches
post.fullText: Today, the Connor Kurtz Music website was launched.
post.shortText: Today, the Connor Kurtz Music website was launched.
